response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item, which I believe could be equally valuable to you, is being offered to you at an exclusive price of $500,000. Given its rarity and the potential it holds, I am confident that this investment could significantly benefit you in the long run.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product. I am more than happy to provide additional information to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 500000}
